org.beanfabrics.event

Class ListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.beanfabrics.event.ListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, ListListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WeakListAdapter

    public class ListAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ListListener
    An abstract adapter class for receiving list events. The methods in this class are empty. This class exists as convenience for creating listener objects.

    Extend this class to create ListListener and override the methods for the events of interest.

    Author:
    Michael Karneim
